echo:EchoCeption.NAME: Echo-ception
echo:EchoCeption.DESCRIPTION: echo:Charged: echo:duplicate Echo. NL Otherwise, gain !M! echo:Ultimate_Charge.

echo:EchoWho.NAME: Echo-who
echo:EchoWho.DESCRIPTION: echo:Charged: echo:duplicate a random character. NL Otherwise, add a random colorless card into your hand.
